document.heading: Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Act of 2014

history.narrative: Law 20-155, the “Fiscal Year 2015 Budget Support Act of 2014,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 20-750. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on May 28, 2014, and June 24, 2014, respectively. Returned without the Mayor’s signature on Sept. 19, 2014, it was assigned Act No. 20-424 and transmitted to Congress for its review. D.C. Law 20-155 became effective on Feb. 26, 2015.
